Lyric:
[00:19.75]Oh please don't let me die
[00:22.03]Waiting for your touch
[00:24.94]
[00:27.57]No, don't give up on life
[00:29.76]This endless dead end
[00:37.56]狂った時計 刻む命
[00:41.52]こぼれてく記憶の砂
[00:45.40]芽生えた 思いまで
[00:49.34]ねえ こんなに呆気なく
[00:56.16]消えてしまうの
[01:01.50]I wish I was there...
[01:02.63]
[01:02.88]Oh, please don't let me die
[01:04.95]Waiting for your touch
[01:07.13]二度と なにも 失くさぬように
[01:11.53]私を忘れて 始めて "Restart!"
[01:18.33]No, don't give up on life
[01:20.57]This endless dead end
[01:22.74]君を砕くこの悲しみが
[01:27.42]いつか 終わりますように
[01:32.46]For now I'll see you off
[01:36.32]
[01:36.83]My time is spinning around
[01:40.53]Your deep black eyes
[01:44.59]I forgot what time it is
[01:48.29]And our memories are gone...?
[01:52.26]
[01:53.70]甘い香り放つ
[01:57.64]追憶と いう名の罠
[02:01.51]誘われ 囚われ
[02:05.42]なぜ 抗えもせずまた
[02:12.24]溺れてしまうの
[02:17.59]I wish you were here
[02:18.75]
[02:18.87]Oh, never close your eyes
[02:21.02]Searching for a true fate
[02:23.25]どこか 消えた あのぬくもりを
[02:27.64]追いかけ 続けて 見失う "Restart!"
[02:34.43]So, let us try again
[02:36.62]From the very first time
[02:38.84]"きっときっと" そうやって今も
[02:43.44]虚しい 輪を描いてる
[02:48.56]For now, see you again
[02:51.75]
[02:52.68]Fading in Fading out
[03:00.46]Fading in Fading out
[03:06.39]
[03:19.99]I wish we were there
[03:20.90]
[03:21.30]あの日々には 戻れない
[03:25.69]時は強く 哀しく強く
[03:30.03]ただただ 進んで ゆくだけ"Restart" 
[03:36.85]No don't give up on life
[03:39.08]This endless dead end
[03:41.29]振り返らない そんな強さを
[03:45.92]誰も皆演じてる
[03:51.01]For now I'll see you off
[03:55.22]
[03:56.64]And we'll die
[03:58.10]Waiting for a new day
[04:00.26]二度と...
[04:04.46]And we'll start
[04:05.94]Waiting for a new day
[04:08.08]君と...
[04:10.04]Oh please don't let me die
[04:16.14]消えないで ah...
